name: Nomad's Relic
description:
Find your relic!

Your tribe has been dispersed and the stars tell of a great disaster in 40 days! Gather your people and find your lost ancestral relic before the 40th day ends.

Gameplay heavily inspired by Kingdom.

Instructions
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • E to interact with environment
  • C to set up camp
  • SPACE to attack
Tips
  • Gather food into your foodstore (displayed in bottom right) to feed your people.
  • Livestock provide food when you fast travel.
  • Tribespeople will help defend your livestock, gather resources and clear obstacles. Keep them fed when they're hungry and want to camp.
  • Traveling far and gathering more tribespeople will help you locate the relic.
